content: विचिंत् {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To think, consider. {@--2@} To think of, ponder over, call to mind; विचिंतयंती यमनन्यमानसा <ls>Ś. 4. 1.</ls> {@--3@} To take into consideration, have regard to, regard; अस्मान्साधु विचिंत्य संमयधनानुच्चैःकुलं चात्मनः <ls>Ś. 4. 16.</ls> {@--4@} To intend, fix upon, determine. {@--5@} To devise, find out, discover. {@--6@} To imagine. {@--7@} To perceive, observe (<ab>Ved.</ab>).
